Description: Fragment of belly of Attic black-figure painted pottery one-piece belly amphora. Shoulder, upper arm and part of chest of male figure, probably a hoplite.
Curator's comments: Perhaps from the same pot as BM GR 1888,0208.123.b (Pl. GB 608, 22)
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 608, 23)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 69)
